titleStmt.title: Articles to be ministred, enquired of and answered concerning matters ecclesiastical in the first episcopal visitation of the Right Reverend father in God Gilbert, by Gods divine providence Lord Bishop of Bristol, in the second year of his consecration.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Bristol. Bishop (1661-1671 : Ironside)
Ironside, Gilbert, 1588-1671.

notesStmt.note: Fifth item in a collection of visitation articles.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library and Bodleian Library.
